entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
